alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 2:58AM CDT until March 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Davis Mountains, Davis Mountains foothills, Chinati Mountains, Chisos Basin, Pecos County, Marfa Plateau, Central Brewster County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Difficult travel conditions are possible, especially in the highest terrain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Pecos
